item.title: Covid-19 Delta Variant % Share of Cases Grew Logistically
item.description: Today as part of my work with the Mathematics Consortium Working Group (Hughes-Hallett et.al. Calculus textbooks) I stumbled upon the surprising fact that in many countries the % share of Covid-19 cases that were Delta variant grew almost perfectly logistically from 0% to 100% during 2021. The graph below, which started all of this, should come up if one follows this Our World In Data link. Image downloaded from Our World in Data, open access under the Creative Commons BY license.

item.title: Tikz 3D - Twisted Cubic
